title: Drew Shives
text:
hi!

I’m Drew and I am a PhD candidate at The Graduate Center, CUNY studying cognitive science in their Cognitive & Comparative Psychology training area. I am also a Senior Data Scientist at Zenith Media. In my free time I am an avid photographer (check out my gallery page!) and home cook.



education
